summary:
Adds a huge dungeon divided in 6 parts. The entrance is situated near Markarth (look on image for exact location). The location is already discovered so you can fast travel there directly!
The dungeon is available in 2 levels on difficulty, normal and hard.
descriptionHtml:
Dungeons: Siege of Morghak Fortress
By Lord Dagobert
November 2013
Description:
Adds a huge dungeon divided in 6 parts. The entrance is situated near Markarth (look on image for exact location). The location is already discovered so you can fast travel there directly!
The dungeon is available in 2 levels on difficulty, normal and hard. To be able to do the hard mode, you must first accomplish the dungeon once in normal difficulty and loot the key from the last boss. The normal mode is as difficult as my previous dungeon mods, while the hard mode is 2x harder. All the enemies respawn so you can do the dungeon again. The bosses drop special items (Morghak War Horn on normal mode and Legendary War Horn on hard mode) which allow you to craft & improve 4 new armor sets.
List of Bosses: (Total of 13)
Underground Passage (2 bosses)
?	Bonechewer
?	MossFang
Entrance of Warriors (1 boss)
?	Instructor Borhzak
Halls of Conquered Kings (4 bosses)
?	Queen Lharaz’el
?	Kingslayer Gorshaz
?	Beastmaster Grushna
?	Orhbak the Dragonslayer
Fiery Ramparts (3 bosses)
?	Tornosh Iron-Flesh
?	The Executionner
?	General Nazrek
Unholy Cathedral (2 bosses)
?	Shade of Queen Marza
?	Shade of Queen Urga
Throne of Blood (1 boss)
?	King Morghak, Lord of Blood and Sulfur

New Items:
4 new Armor Sets:
Normal Mode:
?	Morghak Armor (light)
?	Heavy Morghak Armor (heavy)
Hard Mode:
?	Shaman’s Regalia (light)
?	Berserker’s Set (heavy)
2 new weapons:
?	Executionner Axe
?	General’s Axe

Materials required to forge new armor:
?	Armor: 10 Morghak War Horns (normal difficulty armor) / 10 Legendary War Horns (hard mode difficulty armor)
?	Boot: 5 Morghak War Horns (normal difficulty armor) / 5 Legendary War Horns (hard mode difficulty armor)
?	Gauntlets: 5 Morghak War Horns (normal difficulty armor) / 5 Legendary War Horns (hard mode difficulty armor)
?	Helmet: 5 Morghak War Horns (normal difficulty armor) / 5 Legendary War Horns (hard mode difficulty armor)
?	Shield: 5 Morghak War Horns (normal difficulty armor) / 5 Legendary War Horns (hard mode difficulty armor)
?	Improve an existing piece of Armor: 1 Morghak War Horns (normal difficulty armor) / 1 Legendary War Horns (hard mode difficulty armor)
Total: 30 Horns for 1 complete armor set + 5 to improve it.
Total of War Horns for 1 dungeon run:
On normal: 15 Morghak War Horns
On hard mode: 15 Legendary War Horns
Enjoy the mod!
author: Lord Dagobert
